summary:
This Mod is not lore-friendly at all. Please understand that first.
This Mod replace the existing followers in Skyrim.
Standalone,replace only face.(The option of CBBE v3 and UNP is also prepared.)
Looks of 19 persons Follower is changed now.
descriptionHtml:
[img]https://lh6.googleusercontent.com/-KSM78I2EOjs/UohVQWB8ifI/AAAAAAAAAxo/nmgi0VnQgz4/w920-h327-no/b5.jpg[/img]
[size=4][color=yellowgreen][b]v2.0 Ria and Ugor were added and change of all the existing female followers finished![/b][/color][/size]


Thank you very much viewing this mod.
This Mod replace the existing followers in Skyrim.(standalone)
[u]The file Aela,and DLC characters are optional.[/u]
Prepared for optional individual files of other followers.
It corresponds to the [u]version 1.9.32.[/u] The other version does not have a guarantee of operation.


[size=6][color=lightblue][b]Introduction[/b][/color][/size]

This Mod is not lore-friendly at all. Please understand that first.
Significantly altering the appearance of the girls was very challenging, it was difficult for me.
Beauty is in the eye of the beholder I understand you may not like every change I have made.
So I have made each girl available in single files so you can download the ones you like,.


[size=8][color=red][b]Warning!!![/b][/color][/size]

For information about the option file of Aela.[u](CBBE and UNP Body version)[/u]

To install the option file of Aela. Please only use this file after completing Companions "The Silver Hand" quest.
The problem is that the facial expression of Aela does not change at all and when you enter the UnderForge is guaranteed to happen.
It does not improve over time, and the game save is forever tainted
Please re-install after you have completed the "The Silver Hand" by uninstall options Aela If you installed earlier by mistake .
Just to be sure, please back up your save data.

[color=yellow]I will not be able to fix this bug.
In addition, please download with the understanding I will not take the responsibility in any case.[/color]


[size=6][color=lightblue][b]Features[/b][/color][/size]

[color=yellow]Replace only Face(set to Body which you have installed.)[/color]
Standalone (Is not required of other MOD.)
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/35267]SG Female Texture Renewal[/url] is used for a face texture.
The version which includes the CBBE and UNP body in an option is prepared. (It does not correspond to BBP.)


[size=6][color=lightblue][b]Future plans[/b][/color][/size]

1.Add further the followers.(I would like to add at about one follower's pace per week.)
[s]2.A playable character is used.[/s] Sorry,It cannot make so that it may be made to function perfectly.


[size=6][color=lightblue][b]Installation[/b][/color][/size]

Use NMM installer.
Or manually copy and paste the Data folder to your Skyrim folder.

Datameshes111NordRace
DatameshesactorscharacterFaceGenDataFaceGeomSkyrim.esm(Dawnguard,HerthFire,Dragonborn)"File ID number of the target character"
Datatextures111NordRace
DatatexturesactorscharacterFaceGenDataFaceTintSkyrim.esm(Dawnguard,HerthFire,Dragonborn)"File ID number of the target character"
DataSBF "Character name".esp
DateReadmesSBF readme

[size=8][color=red][b]Cautions[/b][/color][/size]
[size=3][color=yellow]This Mod adds Skin to the existing Race, and replaces the face of Follower.
since -- [u]it competes with other Mod which add change to Race.[/u]
(SkyRe_Races.esp of T3nd0s Skyrim Redorn, esp of Enhanced Character Edit, etc.) In order to avoid competition, please carry out a load order before those esp. [/color][/size]


[size=6][color=lightblue][b]Uninstallation[/b][/color][/size]

Use NMM installer
Or just delete any files from this mod.

Delete these files:
Datameshes111NordRace
DatameshesactorscharacterFaceGenDataFaceGeomSkyrim.esm(Dawnguard,HerthFire,Dragonborn)"File ID number of the target character"
Datatextures111NordRace
DatatexturesactorscharacterFaceGenDataFaceTintSkyrim.esm(Dawnguard,HerthFire,Dragonborn)"File ID number of the target character"
DataSBF "Character name".esp
DateReadmesSBF readme

*Character ID
Adelaisa:0001411D,Aela:0001A696,Annekke:00013666,Aranea:00028AD0,Borgakh:19959,
Brelyna:0001C196,Eola:0001990F,Frea:00017934,Illia,00048C2F,Ingjard:0001541B,Iona:000A2C91,
Jenassa:000B9982,Jordis:000A2C8F,Lydia:000A2C8E,Mjoll:0001336B,Njada:0001A6D9,Rayya:00005215,
Serana:00002B6C,Uthgerd:000918E2



[size=6][color=lightblue][b]Recommended Mod[/b][/color][/size]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2666]CBBE v3 Body by Caliente[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/6709]DIMONIZED UNP female body by dimon99[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/35267]SG Female Texture Renewal by HelloSanta[/url]---for Body texture
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/35303]Female Facial Animation by nao4288[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/28147]zzjay and Grace Darklings Hoods with hairs by zzjay and Grace Darkling[/url]---Serana Hood with Hair Replacer
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/11371//?]83Willows WHITER TEETH 4all - Orc Khajiit Argonian Werewolf by 83Willow[/url]---Borgakh's teeth


[size=5][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/56020/?]AIR ENB by hrk1025[/url]---My New ENB setting[/size]

[img]https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/-K8nqWvFULUA/U8eJZs8F0TI/AAAAAAAABCs/uJBBt4ubIjE/w920-h518-no/ScreenShot54001.jpg[/img]


[size=6][color=lightblue][b]Troubleshooting[/b][/color][/size]

[color=yellow]Q.[/color]Are options, such as No Face Tatoo, applicable to the file of All In One?
[color=lightblue]A.[/color]Yes, please install an option by overwrite after installing All In One.
Please have a load order back from All In One.


[color=yellow]Q.[/color]The head and a bodily knot are conspicuous.
[color=lightblue]A.1[/color]The face of SBF is using [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/35267]SG Female Texture Renewal[/url].
In the form corresponding to it, if the installation back SG Female Texture Renewal is installed, a knot is not most conspicuous.
[color=lightblue]A.2[/color]Supposing you are using ENB, please turn OFF FixTintGamma of Fix of a setup.
[color=lightblue]A.3[/color]
Please clean save after purging out left over tint mask files from other follower mods and re-installed SBF.
Then, it may improve.


[color=yellow]Q.[/color] A hairstyle is not displayed correctly.
[color=lightblue]A.[/color]
Competition with the Follower expansion Mod has been reported.
Please replace those Mod and load order.

[color=yellow]Q.[/color] Head of character of some has become dark.
[color=lightblue]A.[/color]
Character you do not want to replace in this Mod is not complete just uncheck the esp.
For replacement of existing followers, you must also delete or move also the two files that were output of texture and mesh date To return to the original.

Please move or delete the files in the following example, if the case of Lydia.
DatameshesactorscharacterFaceGenDataFaceGeomSkyrim.esm00A2C8E.nif
DatatexturesactorscharacterFaceGenDataFaceTintSkyrim.esm00A2C8E.dds

Alternatively, please select and install the follower from the options file.
Please perform the integration and overwrite file if you want to install the option file a Follower more than one.


[color=yellow]Q.[/color] I can not load it happen to CTD.
[color=lightblue]A.[/color]
Load seems prone CTD particularly large over Proudspire Manor.
Please try to install the Mod in a different place from follow when you end up CTD before you meet the Jordis.(As is the case also Iona)


[size=6][color=lightblue][b]Credits[/b][/color][/size]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/12951]Enhanced Character Edit by tktk[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/13722]The Eyes Of Beauty by Gabriel Mailhot[/url]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/35327]SG Female Eyebrow by HelloSanta[/url]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/18110]Hair packs of TES IV Oblivion for Female Only[/url]
---And author of the original
Creator of the original Mod:Ren,Data of the origin used as a framework apachii hair:apachii,NewSea Sims Hair:NewSea at newseasims.com,Hair pack of Evy Race:Nani0427

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2666]CBBE v3 Body by Caliente[/url]

Use in the screenshots
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/39821/?]HRK ENB by hrk1025[/url]---My ENB setting
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/13457]Face Light by tktk[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/16248]Pretty_Sit_Idles by dualsun[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/28014]Dawnguard Vampire Armors Retexture by Messias Mummo[/url]---Serana armor
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/28147]zzjay and Grace Darklings Hoods with hairs by zzjay and Grace Darkling[/url]---Serana Hood with Hair Replacer
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/11371//?]83Willows WHITER TEETH 4all - Orc Khajiit Argonian Werewolf by 83Willow[/url]---Borgakh's teeth

I'm Japanese. Sorry,my English is not good enough.



[size=4][color=lightblue][b]Log[/b][/color][/size]

2013.07.05 - v1.0 Release.
2013.07.06 - File upload individual.
2013.07.07 - v1.01 File upload UNP version.
2013.07.07 - v1.02 Small bugfix
2013.07.08 - v1.03 Add No face Tatoo Option.(Aela, Jenassa and Mjoll)
2013.07.09 - v1.1 Added Serana.
2013.07.15 - v1.2B Change the Only Face Beta release.
2013.07.17 - v1.3 All the files are changed into what only a face replaces. Brelyna and Frea are added.
2013.07.18 - The option which does not change the eyes of Serana is uploaded.
2013.07.22 - v1.4 Added Rayya.
2013.07.25 - Added one esp version. No face tatoo version is changed into a standalone.
2013.07.29 - v1.5 Added Illia,Uthgerd and All in One esp version.
2013.08.04 - v1.52 Added CBBE and UNP Body version of All In One esp.
2013.08.09 - v1.6 Added Annekke and Eola.
2013.08.16 - v1.7 Added Adelaisa and Aranea.
2013.09.03 - v1.8 Added Borgakh,Ingjard and Njada.
2013.09.05 - v1.81 It corrected that there was a problem in esp of Aranea by v1.8.(file of Main File
and Aranea)
2013.09.05 - v1.82 It corrected that the face texture of Annekke and Borgakh are mistake.
2013.09.20 - v1.9 Added Beleval and Dark Brotherhood Initiate.
2013.10.12 - v2.0 Added Ria and Ugor.
2013.11.17 - v2.1 The texture specification mistake of Eola,Ria and Ugor was corrected.
[size=6][color=lightblue][b]Video[/b][/color][/size]

[youtube]7Gt9ErSDWOk[/youtube] [youtube]4dNHvqv0bvQ[/youtube]
